column5: I got out friday to try for some late season pike. Could not get the pike to bite but i did manage my first ever steelhead?? x2 What a fight these fish put up! Seeing these fish in pictures is neat, but catching one and seeing it person is a whole other thing. Both fish were released after a quick pic.     Thanks for reading
cool
Nicely done !!!Great surprise x2!!
Nice fish bro
I though about waking up early and trying for some pike...but I was lazy and stayed in bed. If this weather holds up maybe next sunday. Nice catch thanks for sharing.
Nice fish. The 2nd is very clean and good looking
Thanks for the comments. It was a lot of fun catching these fish and i definitely think I'll be targeting them next season.
What's your go to lure this time of year? I've tried everything so far and no luck (spinner baits, jerk baits, spoons, soft plastics...)
very nice dude, good fish for your first steelhead
Great bi-catch I wouldn't wait until next year to target them!
What, and pass up on those cute lookin' pike!?  Nice catch!!
Nice
beauties, i need to hook into a couple like that
Nice work! That 2nd fish has nice markings!
Right on, chunky looking fish! Just curious what bait you got them on? I'm mostly a roe fishermen but want to really start utilizing artificial casting baits...

They both hit a white spinnerbait fished slow, the first one hit it within a couple of seconds of hitting the water, the second one hit it near the bottom. There is a lot of steelhead guys here that fish with lures
nice steel congrats
Lots of steelhead rookies (myself included) sitting here slackjawed that you smashed two gorgeous fish with pike tackle.  Well done!
Thanks, I sure wasn't expecting these beauties, but as soon as the first fish hit I knew it was no pike
Those are some nice fish - you lucked out. I usually target anything but pike, and what do I catch? Pike!
